feature_model.name: Car PL

meta.data: A feature model of a simple automobile product line
Vanderbilt University, Nashville, TN, USA and University of Seville, Seville, Spain
Jules White, Brian Dougherty, Doulas C. Schmidt, Automated Reasoning for Multi-step Feature Model Configuration Problems, SPLC 2009, San Francisco, USA.

feature_model.feature_tree: :r Car(_id_0) :o Automated Driving Controller(_id_1) :m Collision Avoidance Braking(_id_2) :g (_id_3) [1,1] : Standard Avoidance(_id_4) : Enhanced Avoidance(enhanced_avoidance) :o Parallel Parking(parallel_parking) :m Sensors(_id_5) :o Lateral Range Finder(lateral_range_finder) :o Forward Range Finder(forward_range_finder) :o Tilt Down(_id_0_10) :o CLH(_id_0_11) :g (_id_0_11_12) [1,1] : with RLS(_id_0_11_12_13) : with Low Cost Light Sensor(_id_0_11_12_14) : No Light Sensor(_id_0_11_12_15)
feature_model.constraints: c1:~enhanced_avoidance or forward_range_finder c2:parallel_parking or lateral_range_finder
